import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navigation from './Navigation' import { Button } from 'reactstrap' const Caesar = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(''); function handleChange(name, value) { if (name === 'usuario') { setUser(value) } } return (
caesar
mensaje handleChange(e.target.name, e.target.value)} />
) } export default Caesar
